summary: The document is a historical record from the CIA, dated January 24, 1962, related to the President John F. Kennedy assassination records. It details an information report appealing to President Kennedy, with mentions of Vietnam and Cambodia, including a group's plans for asylum and their opposition to Diem and the Viet Cong. This document is part of the National Security Files and was last reviewed on September 10, 2000.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK assassination records released under the 1992 Act.
It contains an information report from the CIA regarding an appeal to President Kennedy.
References to Vietnam and Cambodia, including a group's desire for asylum and opposition to Diem and the VC.
The document was classified and had dissemination controls marked as NOFORN/CONTINUED CONTROL.
